summary: Through simple quest discover cave designed for alchemists, with ingredient sorting capability and living quarters
descriptionHtml:
This mod is Skyrim version of alchemy cave found in All-in-One Basement mod for Oblivion. Only ingredient jars and textures (though renewed) created by Dark Jester are being used. Sorting script and cave design is my doing.


Version: 0.8 - working as intended except for a little quest bug
Last release: 7/15/2012


CONTENTS
===========================

• Quest to get access to the cave
• The Cave - Alchemy bench, Ingredient Jars, command console (see readme), bedroom, storeroom (all containers in the cave are non respawning, so is the entire cave) and cooking stands.
• Ingredient jars are sorted alphabetically by their original English names in Skyrim

INSTALATION
===========================
Export archive to Skyrim\\Data folder

BUGS
===========================
• the quest is supposed be started by courier but when the courier meets you he will say he has a note for you but doesn\'t give it to you. Just travel to another habitable cell  (ideally different city) and the courier approaches you again, gives you a note and the quest starts.

• there are few texts I wrote - couriers note, some book about the cave etc but it might be grammatically incorrect \'cos English is not my native language.


To do / Future plans
===========================
• make cave more natural - more clutter and better lighting, hence the version 0.8
• new potions, Dawnguard ingredients jars, add a garden of some sort etc


Hope you\'ll enjoy it
Umpire
author: Umpire
